definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: In Luke chapter 17 there is a story of ten lepers .
sentences.chinese: 路加福音17章裏說到十個長大麻瘋的人的故事。

sentences.english: Jesus healed the ten lepers and asked them to show their bodies to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 章裏說到十個長大麻瘋的人的故事。
